page.content: turn. If you miss the ball, or it stops, you get "punished".Some of the punishments are pinching, squashing, kicking and tickle. To play queenie you use a small ball which the person who is "up" has to throw behind them. Someone catches it and hides it behind their back. The person who is "up" has to guess who has it. To play polo you have two ends. The person who is "up" is at one end and the rest are at the other end. The person who is "up" names a category and the others have to think of a thing in that category. The person who is "up" calls out something in that category. If the one you chose is said, you run from your end to the other end and back again. The person who is "up" also runs and the first one back says "polo"and is the winner.
